#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#include <cmath>
#define l int
#define ll long long int
l main()
{
	l t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,k,m,c=0;
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
		while(1)
		{
			if(double(n)*double(k)>double(m)) break;
				n*=k;
				c+=1;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",c);
	} return 0;
}
